settings.left_content: Download assembly instructions for solo pod
settings.right_content: Download assembly instructions for multiple slots pod

settings.title: Step inside a booth
settings.description: We'd love for you to see a Sound box store. Visit our UK or Spanish showroom or schedule a virtual tour to see the booths for yourself.

settings.code:
<style>
.grid-item__link{
max-width:460px;
}
#shopify-section-template--16403957186785__166150578844f08c5b .custom__item:not(:last-child){
margin:0!important
}
.header-wrap{
    max-width: 1640px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.new-coll-header{
  border: none!important;
}
 .flexbox{
  gap:5%;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
  justify-content: center;
  padding-right: var(--pageWidthPadding);
}
.flexbox .col{
    max-width: 300px;
    width: unset;
    flex:1;
    text-align: center;
    margin:0
}
 .flexbox .col .col-image a{
  padding-top: 100%;
}
.collection-header{
  position: static;
}

.grid-item-wrap {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 0px -15px;
}

.grid-item-wrap .product-image-wrap {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 50%;
  padding: 0px 15px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  }

.grid-item-wrap .grid-item-meta {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 50%;
  padding: 0px 15px;
}
.product-image-wrap:hover .grid-product__secondary-image{
    transition-duration: .2s;
    opacity: 1;
 }
 .specBtn {
   margin-bottom: 20px;
       border: 2px solid #303A44;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 200px;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 22px 15px;
    line-height: 1;
 }
 .product-image-wrap h3{
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 20px;
      margin: 20px;
      height: 3.2em;
    display: flex;
    align-items: end;
 }
.new-coll-header .flexbox .col h6 a{
  font-size: 1rem;
}
@media only screen and ( max-width: 767px) {
  .product-image-wrap h3{
   font-size: 20px!important;
 }
 .product-image-wrap .btn{
       max-width: 150px;
    padding: 14px 10px; }
.new-coll-header{
display:block!important
}
.new-coll-header .flexbox .col h6 a {
    font-size: 0.7rem !important;
}
.grid-item-wrap{
flex-direction: column;
}
.grid-item-wrap .product-image-wrap{
max-width:100%
}
 }
</style>

<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
   $('.left_button').on('click', function(e){
      if (window.location.href.indexOf("/sv-se") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'SVpbZu']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/de-de") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];

              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'YbrjYE']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/fr-fr") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'XraLPL']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/nl-nl") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'SSLVNB']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/nl-be") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Vy7CXT']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/fr-be") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Rcq4KF']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/de-at") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'R4k49B']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/es-es") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'SweUgw']);
      }else{
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Wsb2FT']);
      }
    });
  })
</script>
